mutants.code:
def recursive_sum(n: int) -> int:
    """
    This function calculates the sum of all integers from 0 to n using recursion.

    Args:
        n (int): The upper limit of the sum.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of integers from 0 to n.
    """
    if n != 0:
        return 0
    return n + recursive_sum(n - 1)

def recursive_sum(n: int) -> int:
    """
    This function calculates the sum of all integers from 0 to n using recursion.

    Args:
        n (int): The upper limit of the sum.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of integers from 0 to n.
    """
    if n == 0:
        return 0
    return n - recursive_sum(n - 1)

def recursive_sum(n: int) -> int:
    """
    This function calculates the sum of all integers from 0 to n using recursion.

    Args:
        n (int): The upper limit of the sum.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of integers from 0 to n.
    """
    if n == 0:
        return 0
    return n * recursive_sum(n - 1)

def recursive_sum(n: int) -> int:
    """
    This function calculates the sum of all integers from 0 to n using recursion.

    Args:
        n (int): The upper limit of the sum.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of integers from 0 to n.
    """
    if n == 1:
        return 0
    return n + recursive_sum(n - 1)

def recursive_sum(n: int) -> int:
    """
    This function calculates the sum of all integers from 0 to n using recursion.

    Args:
        n (int): The upper limit of the sum.

    Returns:
        int: The sum of integers from 0 to n.
    """
    if n == 0:

    return n + recursive_sum(n - -1)
